ygData.subject: Re: Luclin
ygData.msgSnippet: I reinstalled the set once after a major malfunction. Lots of download time in that, and there were problems getting all of the files. If you do it, load one
ygData.messageBody:
I reinstalled the set once after a major malfunction. Lots of
download time in that, and there were problems getting all of the
files. If you do it, load one part at a time, and get all the
downloads before going on the the next cd. Otherwise the load will be
too large.

Don't know of another solution. Might try getting in touch with the
techs at EverQuest.com. Takes a while, but I did get help from them
on the few occasions I have had a problem.

Good luck.

Barto Proudfoot

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Wes <aihacker@y...>"
<aihacker@y...> wrote:
> I just tried to install Luclin and it get to 47% complete then
gives
> an error data file is wrong format. Should I reinstall all my
> everquest cds or is there a quick fix?
